message: Vimeo has a html5 player I am pretty sure but YouTube has a HTML5 player too
@italiano40 both sites do have HTML5 modes.
here it is: http://www.boxee.tv/ (was on my phone before)
Youtube's is opt-in (unless you're on mobile). http://youtube.com/html5 to turn it on.

@allenwong look at @dryan message it will tell you
@italiano40 I think he might have been referring to transcoding the video itself. If it's something you'll be doing often, check out http://www.ankoder.com/.
http://thinkvitamin.com/ is a good site to learn some HTML5
